document.full_text: severe storms and tornadoes moving through the southeast dealt a severe blow to the tennessee valley authority on wednesday, causing three nuclear reactors in alabama to shut and knocking out 11 high-voltage power lines, the utility and regulators said.
document.title: storms knock out tva nuclear units, power lines
lines_and_colors: severe storms and tornadoes moving through the southeast dealt a severe blow to the tennessee valley authority on wednesday, causing three nuclear reactors in alabama to shut and knocking out 11 high-voltage power lines, the utility and regulators said.
